title: Can the http2 frame content include a stream id field?
body:
Hello, I observed that in the current http2 protocol content, headers frame and data frame do not have stream id field, which makes it difficult to match the http2request and http2response of the same stream. Is there a way to add a stream id field to the output of header frames and data frames? 
In addition, the data frame is output of several frames together, can we add an interval between the output of each data frame? 

Here are some of the http2 packets that I captured myself
```
{"time":"2025-01-21T11:04:30+08:00","message":"UUID:2555_2555_nginx_22_1_192.168.20.16:61641-192.168.10.201:5443, Name:HTTP2Response, Type:4, Length:10573

Frame Type	=>	HEADERS
```

author: huaixia777

comments.body:
For adding a stream ID field to the output. we just need to read it from the frame header.

And for the frame separation, a new frame will always start with 'Frame Type => ...'. What is your suggestion about it?

I can patch it later.

Thank you for your reply!
As for the framework, I think the current framework structure is good,i just found that there are several data frames output together. I hope can output data frames one by one and output the stream id of each data frame

Test result on new pr: ``` 2025-02-13T16:11:06+08:00 ??? includeSubDomains" header field "surrogate-control" = "no-store" header field "pragma" = "no-cache" header field "expires" = "0" header field "x-content-type-options" = "nosniff" header field "x-xss-protection" = "0" header field "location" = "//www.zhihu.com/signin?next=%2F" header field "x-dayu-backend-response" = "0.002" header field "vary" = "Accept-Encoding" header field "referrer-policy" = "no-referrer-when-downgrade" header field "x-secng-response" = "0.04200005531311" header field "set-cookie" = "BEC=738c6d0432e7aaf738ea36855cdce904;Path=/;Max-Age=3600" header field "cache-control" = "private, must-revalidate, no-cache, no-store, max-age=0" header field "content-length" = "93" header field "x-nws-log-uuid" = "13052027256013954697" header field "x-cache-lookup" = "Cache Miss" header field "x-edge-timing" = "0.099" header field "x-cdn-provider" = "tencent" Frame Type => DATA Frame StreamID => 1 Redirecting to //www.zhihu.com/signin?next=%2F. ```

title: -w保存为pcapng格式文件时显示 save 0 packets into pcapng file.
body:
当我使用AVD模拟器的时候，使用最新的x86-64的ecapture，使用./ecapture tls能够很明显的看见抓的到包，但是当我./ecapture tls -w test.pcapng的时候，最后的输出是这样的：
tls_2022/12/08 10:00:48 TLS1_2_VERSION: save CLIENT_RANDOM 786cc517da567e2c224345d34cde9b1eff101a0b62a03784664a4efe0ef4479a to file success, 176 bytes
tls_2022/12/08 10:00:51 TLS1_2_VERSION: save CLIENT_RANDOM 42627d4f1ef118f4b3b471975f4f6f76d6545d137ffc39f1c741547f9e8ad6ef to file success, 176 bytes


^Ctls_2022/12/08 10:00:53 EBPFProbeOPENSSL      saving pcapng file /data/local/tmp/aito.pcapng
tls_2022/12/08 10:00:53 EBPFProbeOPENSSL         **save 0 packets into pcapng file.**关键就是这里，然后pcapng文件中什么都没有
tls_2022/12/08 10:00:53 EBPFProbeOPENSSL        close.
tls_2022/12/08 10:00:53 EBPFProbeOPENSSL        close.
author: 0xsyj

comments.body:
我也遇到这个问题了，我是android12，已经解决了，可能是网卡选择的问题。
你试试Ifconfig一下列出网卡,可能会有lo,dummy0,eth0,wlan0,
然后 ./ecapture tls -i eth0   -w file.pcapng 试试，或者上面四个都试试。
